hypothesis_content.title: Memecoin Sentiment Reversal After Extreme Social Volume Spike
hypothesis_content.statement: When a memecoin (DOGE or PEPE) experiences social media mention volume >95th percentile (7-day) combined with price decline >8% over 6 hours during BULL/NEUTRAL regimes, a sharp reversal of +10-18% occurs within 12 hours as excessive pessimism meets opportunistic buying.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Extreme social volume during sharp declines indicates panic/capitulation. In non-bear regimes, this creates contrarian opportunities as leveraged longs are flushed and spot buyers step in. Recent DOGE news highlights sensitivity to social sentiment.
entry_conditions: DOGE or PEPE social volume (trackable metric) > 95th percentile (7-day)

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price retraces 61.8% of the 6-hour decline, or RSI(14) reaches 60
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price makes new low below entry candle by -4%

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: High social volume decline continues without reversal, indicating fundamental breakdown or regime misclassification.
